doc:
Eddie Frierson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eddie_Frierson 0 Edward Davies Frierson (born November 22, 1959) is an American voice actor, stage actor and writer. He has provided voices for such films as Wreck-It Ralph, Hotel Transylvania, The Princess and the Frog, ParaNorman, Curious George, Tangled, the video games Medal of Honor: Airborne and Sengoku Basara: Samurai Heroes and the animated television series MÄR: Märchen Awakens Romance but is perhaps best known for playing Baseball Hall of Fame pitcher Christy Mathewson in the one-man show Matty: An Evening with Christy Mathewson. Edward_Davies_Frierson ( born November_22_,_1959 ) is an_American_voice_actor , stage_actor_and_writer . He has_provided voices for such_films as Wreck-It_Ralph , Hotel_Transylvania , The_Princess and the_Frog , ParaNorman , Curious_George , Tangled , the_video_games_Medal of Honor : Airborne and Sengoku_Basara : Samurai_Heroes and the_animated_television_series_MÄR : Märchen_Awakens_Romance but is_perhaps_best_known for playing Baseball_Hall of Fame_pitcher_Christy_Mathewson in the_one-man_show_Matty : An_Evening with Christy_Mathewson .
